import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Product } from '../../model/Product' import ShopItem from './ShopItem' import './ShopPage.css' interface Props{ listProduct:Product[] } export default function ProductsShow(props:Props) { const [listShow,setListShow] = useState(props.listProduct) const [inputSearch,setInputSearch]= useState('') const onCLickSearch=()=>{ setListShow(listShow.filter(item=>item.name.includes(inputSearch))) } const onCLickRefresh=()=>{ setListShow(props.listProduct) } return (
setInputSearch(e.target.value)}/>
{listShow.map((item)=>)} {/* */}
) }
